title: Can technology ever recreate the human brain? - Quora

response.answer_text: In certain ways, technology most definitely has been able to mimic operations the brain autonomously performs daily in order to keep us alive. Now I don't believe a single instrument could be the average size of a brain and run flawless operations like a brain. Humans haven't completely understood the brain in its entirety yet, there are many more discoveries to be made about the pink matter in our heads. We have to fully encompass the capabilities of the brain before we can program an artificial super computer.
